name: the ballad of moody cookbook
description: welcome to the twine "extended cut" version of my 3 month monster in the making, the 76k Ballad of Moody, featuring my little interpretation: a completely unremarkable human person. the story is, to some degree, about who he is. more importantly, it is about who he is not, and it is about where he is, and who he meets. it is a story fundamentally about belonging despite yourself, and about being loved. also, of course, since this is blaseball, it is about finding all of this amid a world of horrors.
